Event.Message: The VM and host networking components successfully negotiated protocol version '%2'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VersionLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VersionLen"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The VM and host networking components failed to negotiate protocol version '%2'

Event.Message: NBL %2 miniport NIC '%5' is dropped. Reason: %3. Status - %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="Operation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DropReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>
